articles.description: The 42-year-old actress put on an elegant display in a strapless black gown with an eye-catching octopus tentacle design in replacement of a single halter strap for the event on Tuesday evening.
articles.content:
Jenna Dewan looked stunning as she arrived at the Fashion Trust U.S. Inaugural Awards in Los Angeles on Tuesday evening.

articles.title: Ultra Music Festival: Undercover police officers will be watching EDM fans, chief says - WPLG Local 10
articles.description: Miami is preparing to welcome about 170,000 electronic dance music fans from around the world in just two days for a festival that organizers say will have a nearly $200 million economic impact in the area.
